properties.title: Sentinel-1 for Surface Soil Moisture
properties.description: Develop, implement and test soil moisture retrieval methods using Sentinel-1 dataThe C-band Sentinel-1 (S-1) European Radar Observatory, with its two satellites (S-1A & B), is the only operating SAR mission with monitoring capabilities, frequent revisit and large geographical coverage that will guarantee data continuity over the next decades.
properties.osc:consortium: CNR – INSTITUTE FOR ELECTROMAGNETIC SENSING OF THE ENVIRONMENT (IREA) (IT), GAMMA REMOTE SENSING AG (CH), Institute of Geodesy and Cartography (IGiK) (PL), LUDWIG-MAXIMILIAN UNIVERSITAT MUNCHEN (DE)
